statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 2 \\ 0 \\ -3 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 2 \\ 0 \\ -1 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 0 \\ 0 \\ -2 \\ 5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -7 \\ -8 \\ 0 \\ 10 \\ -3 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
